sn23.46:4.2: When Venerable Rādha was seated to one side, the Buddha said to him:
sn23.46:4.3: “Rādha, you should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for whatever is liable to cease.
sn23.46:4.5: And what is liable to cease?
sn23.46:4.7: You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for it.
sn23.46:4.12: You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for it.
sn23.46:4.13: You should give up any desire, any greed, any desire and greed for whatever is liable to cease.”
sn23.46:7.1: The Linked Discourses with Rādha are complete.
